title: Western Sydney Escape near Blue Mountains with A$30 Dining Credit
description:
Experience comfort and convenience at this hotel in Western Sydney, your perfect launchpad for exploring the region. Located just a stoneâ€™s throw from the Nepean River and the awe-inspiring Blue Mountains, this hotel offers easy access to the area's natural beauty and attractions. Discover the Penrith Regional Gallery or catch a live performance at the Joan Sutherland Performing Arts Centre.

Food lovers will appreciate the hotel's proximity to the local culinary scene, offering everything from modern Australian fare to international flavours. The hotel boasts a fitness centre, refreshing outdoor pool and inviting lobby bar, perfect for kicking off the evening with a cocktail. Whether you're here to relax or adventure, this homey pad is ideal for a memorable stay in Western Sydney.
offer_address: Panther Place, Penrith, Sydney, New South Wales 2750, Australia

title: Western Sydney Penrith Escape near Blue Mountains with Cocktail Bar
description:
Experience the refined elegance of Pullman Sydney Penrith, situated in the heart of Sydney's vibrant western suburbs. This stylish hotel offers a gateway to the picturesque Blue Mountains and the Nepean River, renowned for its scenic walks and picnic spots.

Savour delectable cuisine at the onsite restaurant, Marcel, or enjoy a refreshing drink at the chic Tori Bar. The Penrith Panthers entertainment complex, with its array of dining options and live shows, is just a short stroll away. For art enthusiasts, the nearby Penrith Regional Gallery offers a rich cultural experience
offer_address: 81 Mulgoa Road, Penrith, New South Wales 2750, Australia

title: Western Sydney Penrith Escape near Blue Mountains with Outdoor Pool
description:
Retreat to a comfortable base in Western Sydney with a stay at this stylish hotel - the perfect launchpad to discover the region, including the Nepean River and the majestic Blue Mountains. While exploring, visit the Penrith Regional Gallery or enjoy a live performance at the Joan Sutherland Performing Arts Centre.

Food lovers can indulge in the region's culinary delights, with an array of local eateries offering everything from modern Australian cuisine to international flavours. The hotel itself boasts a fitness centre, outdoor pool and an inviting lobby bar for evening drinks before retreating to your homey pad.
offer_address: Panther Place, Penrith, Sydney, New South Wales 2750, Australia
